law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and amended as KRS 15A.371, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 282, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts as KRS 15A.371, ch. 318, sec. 204, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 317, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Charges against commissioned employees -- Procedure -- Hearing.
